About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a front-end developer who is passionate about Javascript, building great user experiences, fighting for simplicity over complexity, constantly learning and curious.
I've developed with a number of frameworks, such as AngularJS, JQuery along with some ReactJS and its virtual-dom relatives. I enjoy learning new frameworks, libraries and programming philosophies.

Non-Technical Interests

Outside of learning about the web, I have a number of other interests as well. I play guitar, flamenco to be precise. I have two guitar albums out: one named "Azure" by Mediterranean Nights, and one titled "Tales" by Oceo. Other passions aside from the music is cycling, beach activities, and enjoying nature in general.
